CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_event_random_villagers_raid
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon1}Breaking down the door to a seemingly abandoned cottage, you're surprised to find a collection of villagers hiding inside, mainly women, children, and elders. They beg for your mercy, and you decide not to kill them on the spot - after all, they may turn out to be more valuable as prisoners than as corpses.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Raid2}Let the elders and children go for a ransom.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_event_found_gold_raid
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon3}Making your way through an unusually well-appointed cottage, your keen eyes discover a hatch hidden under an unusually-placed carpet. Your eyes glisten with deadly sin as you discover a hidden cache of gold inside. An auspicious start to what will doubtless be a very profitable day...

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_raid_armory
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Raid5}Your men discover a well-stocked armory hidden in a fortified building. Quality weapons and armor line the walls, far better than what most villagers should possess. This cache would significantly improve your troops' equipment.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_captive_rebel
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon5}Your prisoners outnumber your party and have managed to free themselves. Unfortunately for you, their first thought is of revenge, and you find yourself in the midst of violent rebellion. Gathering your troops, you hope your battlefield experience will prove more effective than raw numbers or your positions will be reversed before the day is out.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Rebel2}Use your leadership to quell the rebellion.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_prisoner_sick
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Sick1}One of your captives has fallen seriously ill. The sickness is spreading among the prisoners, and if left untreated could infect your own troops. Your medic recommends immediate action.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_prisoner_skilled
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Skilled1}You discover that one of your prisoners, {CAPTIVE_NAME}, possesses remarkable skills as a warrior. Several of your men have taken notice and suggest that such talent could be useful if properly motivated.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_ransom_demand
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Ransom1}A messenger arrives bearing a substantial ransom offer for {CAPTIVE_NAME}. It seems their family is wealthy and willing to pay handsomely for their return. The offer is generous, but you could potentially negotiate for more.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_prisoner_information
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Info1}During interrogation, {CAPTIVE_NAME} reveals they have valuable information about enemy troop movements and hidden supply caches. They're willing to trade this knowledge for better treatment or perhaps even freedom.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Info4}Release them in exchange for the information.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_guard_brutality
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Guard1}You witness one of your guards treating prisoners with excessive cruelty. While harsh discipline maintains order, this level of brutality is causing unrest among both prisoners and some of your more honorable troops.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Guard2}Discipline the guard and establish fair treatment.
{=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Guard4}Quietly warn the guard to be more discreet.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_prisoner_fight
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon_Fight1}Two prisoners get into a violent altercation. One is badly injured while the other stands over them with a makeshift weapon. Your guards are calling for you to decide their fate.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_female_escape
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon7}You receive word that {CAPTIVE_NAME} has managed to escape. Your guard swears up and down she just disappeared, but their embarrassed stammering tells a different story.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon8}Warn your guards to keep better watch.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_male_escape
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon9}You receive word that {CAPTIVE_NAME} has managed to escape. Your guard swears up and down he just disappeared, but their embarrassed stammering tells a different story.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon8}Warn your guards to keep better watch.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_male_slave_escape
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon10}You receive word that {CAPTIVE_NAME} has managed to escape. His chains appear to have been broken using a tool of some sort.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon8}Warn your guards to keep better watch.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_female_slave_escape
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon11}You receive word that {CAPTIVE_NAME} has managed to escape. Her chains appear to have been broken using a tool of some sort.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon8}Warn your guards to keep better watch.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_female_recruitment
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon12}{CAPTIVE_NAME} approaches you, kneeling respectfully, and tells you they've been watching your leadership during their captivity and are deeply impressed. They ask if you would be willing to let them join you so that they might serve under your banner.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_male_recruitment
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon12}{CAPTIVE_NAME} approaches you, kneeling respectfully, and tells you they've been watching your leadership during their captivity and are deeply impressed. They ask if you would be willing to let them join you so that they might serve under your banner.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_common_prisoner_diplomacy
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon15}A messenger arrives bearing a formal proposal - {CAPTIVE_NAME}'s family offers both gold and a favorable alliance in exchange for their safe return. The offer is generous, but releasing them may have strategic consequences.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_common_escape_attempt
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon19}Your scouts report that one of your prisoners attempted to escape during the night but was recaptured. The prisoner stands before you, defiant despite the failure. Your troops watch to see how you'll handle this challenge to your authority.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_common_cargo_inspection
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon23}While taking inventory of your prisoners' confiscated possessions, you discover valuable contraband hidden among their belongings. This could be sold for profit, but keeping it may cause complications with local authorities.
